text: Qatar Turkish School is a Turkish curriculum school based in Ain Khaled. The school is the first ever Turkish school to be opened in Qatar, it officially opened in December 2016. First Turkish school in Qatar It is the only Turkish school in Qatar. The school is also relatively close to Doha British School, another school based in Ain Khaled. ==References== Category:Schools in Qatar Category:Qatar–Turkey relations
title: Qatar Turkish School
